# [Block Garden](https://kherrick.github.io/block-garden/)

**Type:** 3D Sandbox Exploration and Farming Game
**Platform:** Web (Playable offline, desktop and mobile)
**Tech:** Custom Element, JavaScript, HTML Canvas, Service Worker
**Play Now:** [https://kherrick.github.io/block-garden/](https://kherrick.github.io/block-garden/)

---

> **Block Garden** is a 3D sandbox exploration and farming game available at [https://kherrick.github.io/block-garden/](https://kherrick.github.io/block-garden/).
> Players explore procedurally generated worlds, dig for resources, cultivate plants, and shape their environment.

The game is fully playable without login, and all progress is stored locally or can be exported as downloadable save files.
Gameplay supports keyboard and mouse controls on desktop, and touch controls on mobile.
